game.name: Basket & Ball
game.description:
You are in a playground of a basketball and ready to make some hoops. Hurry up friends! The timer is on and the lovely audience is ready to cheer you up. Grab your ball and get ready to jump, dribble, fly around, pop and explode like no one else does in Basket & Ball! Guide the ball to get into the basket and show off the world that you are skilled enough to make the goals in the limited time period!

This brand new sports game is divided into multiple levels and the best part is that each level comes with unique objects and obstacles to make your gameplay interesting. Do not forget to grab all of the stars that you see along the way before reaching out to the basket. It is awesome to enjoy with the ball and basket that come with the meme faces. The ball will go down when you tap or click on the jump button. Dribble the ball around to achieve your goal timely!

This court is full of water pools, fire, spikes, springs and trampolines. Collect all the three stars to rock in all the 50 unique and addictive levels in this HTML5 basketball game! The collection of the maximum number of stars will help you to get a secure top position on the leaderboard. Timer is on and you can track it by having a look at the top right corner of the screen. Be careful and try to clear each level before the time runs out in this 2d side scroller game!
